segments.text: We'd better cover the porcelain ware against All Risks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Our insurance coverage is 110 % of the invoice value , up to the port of destination only .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd like to have the insurance of the goods covered up to 130 % of the invoice amount .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , this premium for the difference between 130 % and 110 % of the invoice value should be borne by the buyer .
segments.speaker: S2
